descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: In this services design studio students will explore a human centered approach to the design of services. Students will explore and apply design thinking to a client sponsored project and synthesize both user and client needs to the design of tangible consumer touchpoints. This may include experiences plans, digital interface designs, communication models, organizational designs, systems and/or brand tonality deliverables. The course will build on skills learned in 305 with the potential to take the deliverables further. Coursework will be workshop based with a majority of team assignments supported by specific individual responsibilities.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Enrollment is by instructor consent. For permission, please email jimwicks@northwestern.edu
